seo.title: How to get to Positano: all options compared
seo.description: Compare ferry, train+bus, shuttle, and private transfers — with seasonal notes and luggage tips.

linkLabel: How to get to Positano (decision guide)
intro: All realistic ways to reach Positano — compared by season, budget, luggage and arrival time.

sections.title: Via Naples
body: Airport shuttle to Sorrento + SITA to Positano (cheapest), or train to Sorrento + SITA.
Summer: ferries from Molo Beverello in calm seas; check cancellations.

sections.title: Via Salerno
body: Train to Salerno; ferry onward to Positano in season (luggage‑friendly).
Off‑season: bus via Amalfi; slower but reliable.

sections.title: Private transfer
body: Door‑to‑door; pricier but easiest for late arrivals or heavy luggage.

a: Train to Salerno + ferry when seas are calm; avoids road traffic.

faqs.q: Where should I get off the bus?
a: ‘Chiesa Nuova’ gives the fewest stairs to Hostel Brikette (~80 m).
